name: MLMediaGroup
desc: The MLMediaGroup class provides groupings for media objects from a single source of media, such as iTunes or Aperture. The media objects—individual files containing a piece of media such as a photo, song, or movie—are referenced by one or more groups within each media source. These groupings serve as filters, providing hierarchical structure to the collection of objects in each source.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: An identifier for the media group.

items.name: var typeIdentifier: String
items.desc: An identifier for the media group’s type.

items.name: var mediaSourceIdentifier: String
items.desc: An identifier for the source that loaded the media group.

items.name: var mediaLibrary: MLMediaLibrary?
items.desc: A pointer to the media library instance that loaded the media group’s source.

items.name: var attributes: [String : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary of attributes describing the media group.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: The name of the media group.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: The location of the media group.

items.name: var modificationDate: Date?
items.desc: The date and time when the media group was last altered.

items.name: var childGroups: [MLMediaGroup]?
items.desc: A list of child groups contained in the media group.

items.name: var mediaObjects: [MLMediaObject]?
items.desc: A list of media objects in the media group.
